org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network

Class ChannelManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.io.network.ChannelManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BufferProviderBroker, EnvelopeDispatcher

    public class ChannelManager
extends Object
implements EnvelopeDispatcher, BufferProviderBroker
    The channel manager sets up the network buffers and dispatches data between channels.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ChannelManager(ChannelLookupProtocol channelLookupService, InstanceConnectionInfo connectionInfo, int numNetworkBuffers, int networkBufferSize, NetworkConnectionManager networkConnectionManager) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void dispatchFromInputChannel(Envelope envelope)
      Dispatches an envelope from an input channel to the receiving output channels (backwards flow).
      void dispatchFromNetwork(Envelope envelope)
      Dispatches an envelope from an incoming TCP connection.
      void dispatchFromOutputChannel(Envelope envelope)
      Dispatches an envelope from an output channel to the receiving input channels (forward flow).
      BufferProvider getBufferProvider(JobID jobID, ChannelID sourceChannelID) 
      GlobalBufferPool getGlobalBufferPool() 
      void invalidateLookupCacheEntries(Set<ChannelID> channelIDs)
      Invalidates the entries identified by the given channel IDs from the receiver lookup cache.
      void logBufferUtilization() 
      void register(Task task)
      Registers the given task with the channel manager.
      void shutdown() 
      void unregister(ExecutionAttemptID executionId, Task task)
      Unregisters the given task from the channel manager.

      • register

        public void register(Task task)
              throws InsufficientResourcesException
        Registers the given task with the channel manager.
        Parameters:
        task - the task to be registered
        Throws:
        InsufficientResourcesException - thrown if not enough buffers available to safely run this task

      • unregister

        public void unregister(ExecutionAttemptID executionId,
                       Task task)
        Unregisters the given task from the channel manager.
        Parameters:
        executionId - the ID of the task to be unregistered
        task - the task to be unregistered

        Invalidates the entries identified by the given channel IDs from the receiver lookup cache.
        Parameters:
        channelIDs - channel IDs for entries to invalidate

      • dispatchFromNetwork

        public void dispatchFromNetwork(Envelope envelope)
                         throws IOException,
                                InterruptedException
        Description copied from interface: EnvelopeDispatcher
        Dispatches an envelope from an incoming TCP connection.

        After an envelope has been constructed from a TCP socket, this method is called to send the envelope to the receiving input channel.

        Specified by:
        dispatchFromNetwork in interface EnvelopeDispatcher
        Parameters:
        envelope - envelope to be sent
        Throws:
        IOException
        InterruptedException
